   23: -module(tls_1_3_version_SUITE).
   24: 
   25: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   26: -include_lib("public_key/include/public_key.hrl").
   27: %% Common test
   28: -export([all/0,
   29:          groups/0,
   30:          init_per_suite/1,
   31:          init_per_group/2,
   32:          end_per_suite/1,
   33:          end_per_group/2
   34:         ]).
   35: 
   36: %% Test cases
   37: -export([tls13_client_tls12_server/0,
   38:          tls13_client_tls12_server/1,
   39:          tls13_client_with_ext_tls12_server/0,
   40:          tls13_client_with_ext_tls12_server/1,
   41:          tls12_client_tls13_server/0,
   42:          tls12_client_tls13_server/1,
   43:          tls_client_tls10_server/0,
   44:          tls_client_tls10_server/1,
   45:          tls_client_tls11_server/0,
   46:          tls_client_tls11_server/1,
   47:          tls_client_tls12_server/0,
   48:          tls_client_tls12_server/1,
   49:          tls10_client_tls_server/0,
   50:          tls10_client_tls_server/1,
   51:          tls11_client_tls_server/0,
   52:          tls11_client_tls_server/1,
   53:          tls12_client_tls_server/0,
   54:          tls12_client_tls_server/1,
   55:          legacy_tls12_client_tls_server/0,
   56:          legacy_tls12_client_tls_server/1,
   57:          legacy_tls12_server_tls_client/0,
   58:          legacy_tls12_server_tls_client/1,
   59:          tls13_client_tls11_server/0,
   60:          tls13_client_tls11_server/1,
   61:          tls12_legacy_cert_sign/0,
   62:          tls12_legacy_cert_sign/1,
   63:          tls13_legacy_cert_sign/0,
   64:          tls13_legacy_cert_sign/1,
   65:          tls13_legacy_cert_sign_with_pss_rsae/0,
   66:          tls13_legacy_cert_sign_with_pss_rsae/1,
   67:          tls12_legacy_cert_sign_with_pss_rsae/0,
   68:          tls12_legacy_cert_sign_with_pss_rsae/1,
   69:          middle_box_tls13_client/0,
   70:          middle_box_tls13_client/1,
   71:          middle_box_tls12_enabled_client/0,
   72:          middle_box_tls12_enabled_client/1,
   73:          middle_box_client_tls_v2_session_reused/0,
   74:          middle_box_client_tls_v2_session_reused/1,
   75:          renegotiate_error/0,
   76:          renegotiate_error/1,
   77:          client_cert_fail_alert_active/0,
   78:          client_cert_fail_alert_active/1,
   79:          client_cert_fail_alert_passive/0,
   80:          client_cert_fail_alert_passive/1
   81:         ]).
   82: 
   83: 
   84: %% Test callback
   85: -export([check_session_id/2]).
   86: 
   87: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   88: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   89: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   90: all() -> 
   91:     [
   92:      cert_groups()
   93:     ].
   94: 
   95: groups() ->
   96:     [
   97:      {rsa, [], tls_1_3_1_2_tests() ++ legacy_tests()},
   98:      {ecdsa, [], tls_1_3_1_2_tests()}
   99:     ].
  100: 
  101: cert_groups() ->
  102:     [{group, rsa},
  103:      {group, ecdsa}].
  104: 
  105: tls_1_3_1_2_tests() ->
  106:     [tls13_client_tls12_server,
  107:      tls13_client_with_ext_tls12_server,
  108:      tls12_client_tls13_server,
  109:      tls_client_tls12_server,
  110:      tls12_client_tls_server,
  111:      legacy_tls12_client_tls_server,
  112:      legacy_tls12_server_tls_client,
  113:      middle_box_tls13_client,
  114:      middle_box_tls12_enabled_client,
  115:      middle_box_client_tls_v2_session_reused,
  116:      renegotiate_error,
  117:      client_cert_fail_alert_active,
  118:      client_cert_fail_alert_passive   
  119:     ].
  120: legacy_tests() ->
  121:     [tls_client_tls10_server,
  122:      tls_client_tls11_server,
  123:      tls_client_tls12_server,
  124:      tls10_client_tls_server,
  125:      tls11_client_tls_server,
  126:      tls12_client_tls_server,
  127:      tls13_client_tls11_server,
  128:      tls13_legacy_cert_sign,
  129:      tls13_legacy_cert_sign_with_pss_rsae,
  130:      tls12_legacy_cert_sign,
  131:      tls12_legacy_cert_sign_with_pss_rsae
  132:     ].
  133: 
  134: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  135:     catch crypto:stop(),
  136:     try crypto:start() of
  137: 	ok ->
  138:             case ssl_test_lib:sufficient_crypto_support('tlsv1.3') of                
  139:                 true ->
  140:                     ssl_test_lib:clean_start(),
  141:                     [{client_type, erlang}, {server_type, erlang} | 
  142:                      Config];
  143:                 false ->
  144:                     {skip, "Insufficient crypto support for TLS-1.3"}
  145:             end
  146:     catch _:_ ->
  147: 	    {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
  148:     end.
  149: 
  150: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  151:     ssl:stop(),
  152:     application:stop(crypto).
  153: 
  154: init_per_group(rsa, Config0) ->
  155:     Config = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert(Config0),
  156:     COpts = proplists:get_value(client_rsa_opts, Config),
  157:     SOpts = proplists:get_value(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  158:     [{client_type, erlang},
  159:      {server_type, erlang},{client_cert_opts, COpts}, {server_cert_opts, SOpts} | 
  160:      lists:delete(server_cert_opts, lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))];
  161: init_per_group(ecdsa, Config0) ->
  162:     PKAlg = crypto:supports(public_keys),
  163:     case lists:member(ecdsa, PKAlg) andalso 
  164:         (lists:member(ecdh, PKAlg) orelse lists:member(dh, PKAlg)) of
  165:         true ->
  166:             Config = ssl_test_lib:make_ecdsa_cert(Config0),
  167:             COpts = proplists:get_value(client_ecdsa_opts, Config),
  168:             SOpts = proplists:get_value(server_ecdsa_opts, Config),
  169:             [{client_type, erlang},
  170:              {server_type, erlang},{client_cert_opts, COpts}, {server_cert_opts, SOpts} | 
  171:              lists:delete(server_cert_opts, lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))];
  172:         false ->
  173:             {skip, "Missing EC crypto support"}
  174:     end.
  175: 
  176: end_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  177:     ssl_test_lib:end_per_group(GroupName, Config).
  178: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  179: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  180: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  181: 
  182: tls13_client_tls12_server() ->
  183:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.3 client can connect to a TLS 1.2 server."}].
  184: 
  185: tls13_client_tls12_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  186:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']} |
  187:                   ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  188:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2']},
  189:                    {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}
  190:                   | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  191:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  192: 
  193: 
  194:     
  195: tls13_client_with_ext_tls12_server() ->
  196:      [{doc,"Test basic connection between TLS 1.2 server and TLS 1.3 client when " 
  197:        "client has TLS 1.3 specific extensions"}].
  198: 
  199: tls13_client_with_ext_tls12_server(Config) ->
  200:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
  201:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
  202: 
  203:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2']},
  204:                   {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
  205:                   {signature_algs, [rsa_pss_rsae_sha256,
  206:                                     {sha256, rsa},
  207:                                     {sha256, ecdsa},
  208:                                     {sha, ecdsa}]}| ServerOpts0],
  209:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
  210:                   {signature_algs_cert, [ecdsa_secp384r1_sha384,
  211:                                          ecdsa_secp256r1_sha256,
  212:                                          rsa_pss_rsae_sha256,
  213:                                          rsa_pkcs1_sha256,
  214:                                          ecdsa_sha1]}|ClientOpts0],
  215:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  216:    
  217: tls12_client_tls13_server() ->
  218:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.2 client can connect to a TLS 1.3 server."}].
  219: 
  220: tls12_client_tls13_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->    
  221:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2']} |
  222:                   ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  223:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']},
  224:                    {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}
  225:                   | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  226:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  227: 
  228: tls_client_tls10_server() ->
  229:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.0-1.3 client can connect to a TLS 1.0 server."}].
  230: tls_client_tls10_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  231:     CCiphers = ssl:filter_cipher_suites(ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1.3'),
  232:                                         [{key_exchange, fun(srp_rsa)  -> false;
  233:                                                            (srp_anon) -> false;
  234:                                                            (srp_dss) -> false;
  235:                                                            (_) -> true end}]),        
  236:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1', 'tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
  237:                   {ciphers, CCiphers} |
  238:                   ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  239:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1']},
  240:                    {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
  241:                    {ciphers, ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1')}
  242:                   | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  243:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  244: 
  245: tls_client_tls11_server() ->
  246:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.0-1.3 client can connect to a TLS 1.1 server."}].
  247: tls_client_tls11_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  248:     CCiphers = ssl:filter_cipher_suites(ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1.3'),
  249:                                         [{key_exchange, fun(srp_rsa)  -> false;
  250:                                                            (srp_anon) -> false;
  251:                                                            (srp_dss) -> false;
  252:                                                            (_) -> true end}]),    
  253:     ClientOpts = [{versions,
  254:                    ['tlsv1', 'tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
  255:                   {ciphers, CCiphers} |
  256:                   ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  257:     ServerOpts =  [{versions,['tlsv1.1']},
  258:                    {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
  259:                    {ciphers, ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1.1')}  
  260:                   | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  261:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  262: 
  263: tls_client_tls12_server() ->
  264:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.0-1.3 client can connect to a TLS 1.2 server."}].
  265: tls_client_tls12_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  266:     ClientOpts = [{versions,
  267:                    ['tlsv1', 'tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']} |
  268:                   ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  269:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1.2']},
  270:                    {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}
  271:                   | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  272:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  273: 
  274: tls10_client_tls_server() ->
  275:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.0 client can connect to a TLS 1.0-1.3 server."}].
  276: tls10_client_tls_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  277:     SCiphers = ssl:filter_cipher_suites(ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1.3'),
  278:                                         [{key_exchange, fun(srp_rsa)  -> false;
  279:                                                            (srp_anon) -> false;
  280:                                                            (srp_dss) -> false;
  281:                                                            (_) -> true end}]),    
  282:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1']},
  283:                   {ciphers, ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1')} |
  284:                   ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  285:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1','tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
  286:                    {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
  287:                    {ciphers, SCiphers} |
  288:                    ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  289:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  290: 
  291: tls11_client_tls_server() ->
  292:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.1 client can connect to a TLS 1.0-1.3 server."}].
  293: tls11_client_tls_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  294:     SCiphers = ssl:filter_cipher_suites(ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1.3'),
  295:                                         [{key_exchange, fun(srp_rsa)  -> false;
  296:                                                            (srp_anon) -> false;
  297:                                                            (srp_dss) -> false;
  298:                                                            (_) -> true end}]),
  299:     
  300:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.1']},
  301:                   {ciphers, ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1.1')} |
  302:                   ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  303:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1','tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
  304:                    {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
  305:                    {ciphers, SCiphers} |
  306:                    ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  307:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  308: 
  309: tls12_client_tls_server() ->
  310:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.2 client can connect to a TLS 1.0-1.3 server."}].
  311: tls12_client_tls_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  312:     ClientOpts = [{versions,
  313:                    ['tlsv1.2']} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  314:     ServerOpts =  [{versions,
  315:                    ['tlsv1','tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
  316:                    {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true} |
  317:                    ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  318:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  319: 
  320: legacy_tls12_client_tls_server() ->
  321:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.2 client can connect to a TLS 1.3 server."}].
  322: 
  323: legacy_tls12_client_tls_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  324:     SHA = ssl_test_lib:appropriate_sha(crypto:supports()),
  325:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2']}, {signature_algs, [{SHA, rsa}, {SHA, ecdsa}]} |
  326:                   ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  327:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']},
  328:                    {signature_algs, ssl:signature_algs(default, 'tlsv1.3')},
  329:                    {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}
  330:                   | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  331:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  332: 
  333: legacy_tls12_server_tls_client() ->
  334:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.3 enabled client can connect to legacy TLS-1.2 server."}].
  335: 
  336: legacy_tls12_server_tls_client(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  337:     SHA = sha384,
  338:     Prop = proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties, Config),
  339:     Alg = proplists:get_value(name, Prop),
  340:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0, 
  341:       server_config := ServerOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(Alg, [{server_chain,
  342:                                                                                [[{digest, SHA}],
  343:                                                                                 [{digest, SHA}],
  344:                                                                                 [{digest, SHA}]]},
  345:                                                                               {client_chain,
  346:                                                                                [[{digest, SHA}],
  347:                                                                                 [{digest, SHA}],
  348:                                                                                 [{digest, SHA}]]}
  349:                                                                              ]),
  350: 
  351:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']} | ClientOpts0],
  352:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1.2']}, {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
  353:                    {signature_algs, [{SHA, Alg}]}
  354:                   | ServerOpts0],
  355:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  356: 
  357: 
  358: tls13_legacy_cert_sign() ->
  359:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.3 client can connect to  TLS-1.3 server with pkcs1_SHA2 cert"}].
  360: 
  361: tls13_legacy_cert_sign(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  362:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.3']},
  363:                   {signature_algs, rsa_pss_rsae_algs() ++ legacy_rsa_algs()}],
  364:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.3']},
  365:                   {signature_algs, rsa_pss_rsae_algs()},
  366:                   {signature_algs_cert, legacy_rsa_algs()}],
  367: 
  368:     test_rsa_pcks1_cert(sha256, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config),
  369:     test_rsa_pcks1_cert(sha512, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config),
  370:     test_rsa_pcks1_cert(sha384, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  371: 
  372: tls13_legacy_cert_sign_with_pss_rsae() ->
  373:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.3 enabled client can connect to legacy TLS-1.2 server with legacy pkcs1_SHA2 cert"}].
  374: 
  375: tls13_legacy_cert_sign_with_pss_rsae(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  376:     ClientOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']},
  377:                    {signature_algs, rsa_pss_rsae_algs()},
  378:                    {signature_algs_cert, legacy_rsa_algs()}
  379:                   ],
  380:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2']},
  381:                   {signature_algs, rsa_pss_rsae_algs()},
  382:                   {signature_algs_cert, legacy_rsa_algs()}
  383:                  ],
  384: 
  385:     test_rsa_pcks1_cert(sha256, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config),
  386:     test_rsa_pcks1_cert(sha512, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config),
  387:     test_rsa_pcks1_cert(sha384, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  388: 
  389: tls12_legacy_cert_sign() ->
  390:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.2 client (with old configuration) can connect to  TLS-1.2 server with pkcs1_SHA2 cert"}].
  391: 
  392: tls12_legacy_cert_sign(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  393:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2']},
  394:                   {signature_algs, rsa_algs()}],
  395:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2']},
  396:                   {signature_algs, rsa_algs()}],
  397: 
  398:     test_rsa_pcks1_cert(sha256, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config),
  399:     test_rsa_pcks1_cert(sha512, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config),
  400:     test_rsa_pcks1_cert(sha384, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  401: 
  402: tls12_legacy_cert_sign_with_pss_rsae() ->
  403:     [{doc,"Test that a modern TLS 1.2 client can connect to TLS-1.2 server with legacy pkcs1_SHA2 cert"}].
  404: 
  405: tls12_legacy_cert_sign_with_pss_rsae(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  406:     ClientOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1.2']},
  407:                    {signature_algs, rsa_pss_rsae_algs() ++ rsa_algs()}
  408:                   ],
  409:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2']},
  410:                   {signature_algs, rsa_pss_rsae_algs()},
  411:                   {signature_algs_cert, legacy_rsa_algs()}
  412:                  ],
  413: 
  414:     test_rsa_pcks1_cert(sha256, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config),
  415:     test_rsa_pcks1_cert(sha512, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config),
  416:     test_rsa_pcks1_cert(sha384, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  417: 
  418: middle_box_tls13_client() ->
  419:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.3 client can connect to a 1.3 server with and without middle box compatible mode."}].
  420: middle_box_tls13_client(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  421:     ClientOpts = [{versions,
  422:                    ['tlsv1.3']} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  423:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1.3']} |
  424:                    ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  425:     middlebox_test(true, not_empty, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config),
  426:     middlebox_test(false, empty, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  427: 
  428: middle_box_tls12_enabled_client() ->
  429:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.2 enabled client can connect to a TLS 1.3 server with and without middle box compatible mode."}].
  430: middle_box_tls12_enabled_client(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  431:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  432:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1.3']} |
  433:                    ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  434:     middlebox_test(true, not_empty, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config),
  435:     middlebox_test(false, empty, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  436: 
  437: middle_box_client_tls_v2_session_reused() ->
  438:     [{doc, "Test that TLS-1.3 middlebox enabled client can reuse TLS-1.2 session when talking to TLS-1.2 server"}].
  439: middle_box_client_tls_v2_session_reused(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  440:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  441:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
  442:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
  443: 
  444:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  445: 					{from, self()},
  446:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  447:                                         {options, [{versions, ['tlsv1.2']} | ServerOpts]}]),
  448:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  449:     {_Client, CSock} = ssl_test_lib:start_client([return_socket, {node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  450:                                                   {host, Hostname},
  451:                                                   {from, self()},
  452:                                                   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  453:                                                   {options,
  454:                                                    [{versions, ['tlsv1.2']}, {reuse_sessions, save}| ClientOpts]}]),
  455:     Server ! listen,
  456:     {ok,[{session_id, SessionId}, {session_data, SessData}]} = ssl:connection_information(CSock, [session_id, session_data]),
  457:     {_Client1, CSock1}  = ssl_test_lib:start_client([return_socket,
  458:                                                      {node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  459:                                                      {host, Hostname},
  460:                                                      {from, self()},
  461:                                                      {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  462:                                                      {options,
  463:                                                       [{versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']},
  464:                                                        {middlebox_comp_mode, true},
  465:                                                        {reuse_session, {SessionId, SessData}} | ClientOpts]}]),
  466:     {ok,[{session_id, SessionId}]}  = ssl:connection_information(CSock1, [session_id]).
  467: 
  468: renegotiate_error() ->
  469:     [{doc, "Test that an error is returned when ssl:renegotiate/1 is called on a connection running TLS-1.3"}].
  470: renegotiate_error(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  471:     {_ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  472:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
  473:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
  474: 
  475:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  476: 					{from, self()},
  477:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  478:                                         {options, [{versions, ['tlsv1.3']} | ServerOpts]}]),
  479:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  480:     Options = [{versions, ['tlsv1.3']} | ClientOpts],
  481:     case ssl:connect(Hostname, Port, Options) of
  482:         {ok, Socket} ->
  483:             {error, notsup} = ssl:renegotiate(Socket);
  484:         {error, Reason} ->
  485:             ct:fail(Reason)
  486:     end.
  487: 
  488: client_cert_fail_alert_active() ->
  489:     [{doc, "Check that we receive alert message"}].
  490: client_cert_fail_alert_active(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  491:     ssl:clear_pem_cache(),
  492:     {_ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  493:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, client_cert_opts, Config),
  494:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, server_cert_opts, Config),
  495:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  496: 
  497:     NewClientCertFile = filename:join(PrivDir, "clinet_invalid_cert.pem"),
  498:     create_bad_client_certfile(NewClientCertFile, ClientOpts0),
  499: 
  500:     ClientOpts = [{active, true},
  501:                   {verify, verify_peer},
  502:                   {certfile, NewClientCertFile} | proplists:delete(certfile, ClientOpts0)],
  503:     ServerOpts = [{verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}| ServerOpts0],
  504:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  505:                                         {from, self()},
  506:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  507:                                         {options, ServerOpts}]),
  508:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  509:     {ok, Socket} = ssl:connect(Hostname, Port, ClientOpts),
  510:     receive
  511:         {Server, {error, {tls_alert, {unknown_ca, _}}}} ->
  512:             receive
  513:                 {ssl_error, Socket, {tls_alert, {unknown_ca, _}}} ->
  514:                     ok
  515:             after 500 ->
  516:                     ct:fail(no_acticv_msg)
  517:             end
  518:     end.
  519: 
  520: client_cert_fail_alert_passive() ->
  521:     [{doc, "Check that recv or setopts return alert"}].
  522: client_cert_fail_alert_passive(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  523:     ssl:clear_pem_cache(),
  524:     {_, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  525:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, client_cert_opts, Config),
  526:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, server_cert_opts, Config),
  527:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  528: 
  529:     NewClientCertFile = filename:join(PrivDir, "client_invalid_cert.pem"),
  530:     create_bad_client_certfile(NewClientCertFile, ClientOpts0),
  531: 
  532:     ClientOpts = [{active, false},
  533:                   {verify, verify_peer},
  534:                   {certfile, NewClientCertFile} | proplists:delete(certfile, ClientOpts0)],
  535:     ServerOpts = [{verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}| ServerOpts0],
  536:     alert_passive(ServerOpts, ClientOpts, recv,
  537:                   ServerNode, Hostname),
  538:     alert_passive(ServerOpts, ClientOpts, setopts,
  539:                   ServerNode, Hostname).
  540: 
  541: tls13_client_tls11_server() ->
  542:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.3 client gets old server alert from TLS 1.0 server."}].
  543: tls13_client_tls11_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  544:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.3']} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  545:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1']} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  546:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config, insufficient_security).
  547: 
  548: 
  549: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  550: %% Internal functions and callbacks -----------------------------------
  551: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  552: 
  553: middlebox_test(Mode, Expected, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config) ->
  554:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  555:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  556: 					{from, self()},
  557:                                         {mfa, {?MODULE, check_session_id, [Expected]}},
  558:                                         {options, ServerOpts}]),
  559:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  560:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  561: 					{host, Hostname},
  562:                                         {from, self()},
  563:                                         {mfa, {?MODULE, check_session_id, [Expected]}},
  564:                                         {options,
  565:                                          [{middlebox_comp_mode, Mode}| ClientOpts]}]),
  566:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok).
  567: 
  568: check_session_id(Socket, Expected) ->
  569:    {ok, [{session_id, SessionId}]} = ssl:connection_information(Socket, [session_id]),
  570:     case {Expected, SessionId} of
  571:         {empty, <<>>} ->
  572:             ok;
  573:         {not_empty, SessionId} when SessionId =/= <<>> ->
  574:             ok;
  575:         _ ->
  576:             {nok, {{expected, Expected}, {got, SessionId}}}
  577:     end.
  578: 
  579: alert_passive(ServerOpts, ClientOpts, Function,
  580:               ServerNode, Hostname) ->
  581:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  582:                                         {from, self()},
  583:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  584:                                         {options, ServerOpts}]),
  585:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  586:     {ok, Socket} = ssl:connect(Hostname, Port, ClientOpts),
  587:     ct:sleep(500),
  588:     case Function of
  589:         recv ->
  590:             {error, {tls_alert, {unknown_ca,_}}} = ssl:recv(Socket, 0);
  591:         setopts ->
  592:             {error, {tls_alert, {unknown_ca,_}}} = ssl:setopts(Socket, [{active, once}])
  593:     end.
  594: 
  595: create_bad_client_certfile(NewClientCertFile, ClientOpts) ->
  596:     KeyFile =  proplists:get_value(keyfile, ClientOpts),
  597:     [KeyEntry] = ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(KeyFile),
  598:     Key = ssl_test_lib:public_key(public_key:pem_entry_decode(KeyEntry)),
  599:     ClientCertFile = proplists:get_value(certfile, ClientOpts),
  600: 
  601:     [{'Certificate', ClientDerCert, _}] = ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(ClientCertFile),
  602:     ClientOTPCert = public_key:pkix_decode_cert(ClientDerCert, otp),
  603:     ClientOTPTbsCert = ClientOTPCert#'OTPCertificate'.tbsCertificate,
  604:     NewClientDerCert = public_key:pkix_sign(ClientOTPTbsCert, Key),
  605:     ssl_test_lib:der_to_pem(NewClientCertFile, [{'Certificate', NewClientDerCert, not_encrypted}]).
  606: 
  607: test_rsa_pcks1_cert(SHA, COpts, SOpts, Config) ->
  608:     #{client_config := ClientOpts,
  609:       server_config := ServerOpts} = public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => root_key(SHA),
  610:                                                                                    intermediates => intermediates(SHA, 1),
  611:                                                                                    peer => peer_key(SHA)},
  612:                                                                  client_chain => #{root => root_key(SHA),
  613:                                                                                    intermediates => intermediates(SHA, 1),
  614:                                                                                    peer => peer_key(SHA)}}),
  615:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(COpts ++ ClientOpts, SOpts ++ ServerOpts, Config).
  616: 
  617: root_key(SHA) ->
  618:     %% As rsa keygen is not guaranteed to be fast
  619:     [{digest, SHA},{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(6)}].
  620: 
  621: peer_key(SHA) ->
  622:     %% As rsa keygen is not guaranteed to be fast
  623:     [{digest, SHA}, {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(5)}].
  624: 
  625: intermediates(SHA, N) when N =< 2 ->
  626:     Default = lists:duplicate(N, [{digest, SHA}]),
  627:     %% As rsa keygen is not guaranteed to be fast
  628:     hardcode_rsa_keys(Default, N, []).
  629: 
  630: hardcode_rsa_keys([], 0, Acc) ->
  631:     Acc;
  632: hardcode_rsa_keys([Head | Tail], N, Acc) ->
  633:     hardcode_rsa_keys(Tail, N-1, [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(N)} | Head] | Acc]).
  634: 
  635: 
  636: rsa_algs() ->
  637:     [{sha512, rsa}, {sha384, rsa}, {sha256, rsa}].
  638: 
  639: legacy_rsa_algs() ->
  640:     [rsa_pkcs1_sha512,rsa_pkcs1_sha384,rsa_pkcs1_sha256].
  641: 
  642: rsa_pss_rsae_algs() ->
  643:     [rsa_pss_rsae_sha512,rsa_pss_rsae_sha384,rsa_pss_rsae_sha256].
  644:
